metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39318 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: The html/template package does not properly handle HTML-like "" commenttokens, nor hashbang "#!" comment tokens, in <script> contexts. This maycause the template parser to improperly interpret the contents of <script>contexts, causing actions to be improperly escaped. This may be leveragedto perform an XSS attack.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.17 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.18 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.20 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
